scripts.android: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=greenDebug --appIdSuffix=green
scripts.android:greendebug: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=greenDebug --appIdSuffix=green
scripts.release: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.android:pandatest: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=pandaDebug --appIdSuffix=panda
scripts.android:greentest: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=greenDebug --appIdSuffix=green
scripts.android:fashiontest: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=fashionDebug --appIdSuffix=fashion
scripts.android:pandalivedebug: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=pandaDebug --appIdSuffix=panda
scripts.android:greenlivedebug: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=greenDebug --appIdSuffix=green
scripts.android:fashionlivedebug: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=fashionDebug --appIdSuffix=fashion
scripts.android:pandaliverelease: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=releasePanda --appIdSuffix=panda
scripts.android:greenliverelease: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=releaseGreen --appIdSuffix=green
scripts.android:fashionliverelease: adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && npx react-native run-android --mode=releaseFashion --appIdSuffix=fashion
